extensionDescription.message: Overlays Bahá'í Reference Library site with links to wiki pages of quotations and resources for a given work or paragraph

brlMainCollectionHidden_description.message: Whether to avoid display of injected links on the main collections pages

brlCollectionHidden_description.message: Whether to avoid display of injected links on the collections pages

brlMainSectionHidden_description.message: Whether to avoid display of injected links on the main sections pages

brlSubSectionHidden_description.message: Whether to avoid display of injected links on the section pages

brlExtraSectionHidden_description.message: Whether to avoid display of injected links on the extra section pages (e.g., additional Tablets)

brlAnchorLinksHidden_description.message: Whether to avoid display of per-verse anchor links on the section pages

brlAnchorLinkIframesHidden_description.message: Whether to avoid display of per-verse anchor link iframes (the tooltips) on the section opages
